you
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 61 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
empathy let's find out what it means and
how you can use it in your daily
conversation empathy when you see
someone experiencing something that you
had already experienced in your past you
immediately understand and sense what
the person is going through as a result
of your own experience the word empathy
basically means the ability to share
someone's feelings or experiences as if
they were your own so when you put
yourself in someone else's position it
means you are showing empathy you do
this by sharing someone's feelings as
though they were your own you empathize
when you actually identify with the
problems of people and understand their
thoughts and condition the act of
showing empathy means to empathize and a
person who empathizes is known as
empathetic for example a former smoker
is more likely to have empathy with
someone who is trying to quit smoking
this is because he underwent a similar
phase and exactly knows how it feels as
the word empathy is a kind of feeling it
is a noun
okay now that you know what empathy
means let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation example one to
be successful in sales besides having
good selling skills one should learn how
to empathize with their customers
example till after John spent several
months on researching the prison life he
empathized with the exploited prisoners
example three Mary's empathy for others
has distracted her from solving her own
issues at work example for the doctors
empathetic approach towards her patients
has made her a favorite amongst them
example five William empathized with
Kelly when she broke down after telling
her about the tragic loss of her family
member
example six Rosie told her friend my
empathetic nature towards animals has
made me a pure vegetarian I no longer
enjoy having meat
example seven Peters lack of empathy and
understanding made him incapable of
sustaining any relationships example
eight when Samantha saw Maria was being
abused by her husband daily she
empathized with her and reported the
matter to the police example nine I
empathized with James after learning
about the huge loss incurred in the
stock market that's the end of today's
episode have you ever been empathetic
towards someone kindly share your
comments below this video explaining how
you have empathized and in what
situation thank you for watching us do
watch all the episodes of daily video
vocabulary to make you English
communication better subscribe to our
Channel and stay updated with all the
latest lessons I will see you again
tomorrow with another episode till then
bye and take care
